attributes.action: make better use of the proposed ID cards scheme
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Use the ID card scheme to reduce the need to carry other cards and lisences by incorporating them into the ID scheme and making better use of the electronic chips on the card, e.g. Driving Lisence and passport. Driving lisence points could be stored on the card, allowing police to check the cards on the roadside.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
